snippet: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago and Police Superintendent Garry McCarthy rolled out statistics Monday that showed a big drop in the number of killings.
abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel and Police Superintendent Garry McCarthy unveil statistics showing big drop in city's homicide rate in first quarter of 2013, compared to year-earlier period.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Rahm Emanuel of Chicago and Police Superintendent Garry McCarthy rolled out statistics Monday that showed a big drop in the number of killings.

headline.seo: Illinois: Officials Note Drop in Killings
headline.main: Illinois: Officials Note Drop in Killings
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Officials Note Drop In Killings
